sentences: Today, on 30 January 2013, the Bank of Albania's Supervisory Council reviewed and approved the biannual Monetary Policy Statement.

Based on the latest monetary and economic developments in Albania, and following the discussions on their future outlook, the Bank of Albania's Supervisory Council decided to lower the key interest rate by 0.25 percentage points.
After this decision, the one-week repurchase agreement rate drops to new record-low level of 3.75%.
The Supervisory Council deems that further easing of monetary conditions will help in meeting the inflation target in the medium term.
Let me now proceed with an overview of economic and monetary developments, and key issues discussed at today's meeting.
